delete.name: Delete
delete.tooltip:
Remove specific items.
Charged per item deleted.

swap.name: Swap
swap.tooltip:
The current item to
place is swapped out.

confuse.name: Confuse
confuse.tooltip:
Stuns heroes for a short
time before sending them
in a random direction.

slow.name: Slow
slow.tooltip:
Slows all heroes in the
room for the rest of
the level.
